ch.chnoch.thesis.renderer
Class Light

java.lang.Object
  ch.chnoch.thesis.renderer.Light

public class Light
extends java.lang.Object

This class stores the general properties of a light source. Several types of different light sources can be specified. The properties stored in this class will be used by either an OpenGL renderer to render the light or by a software renderer that draws the lights.

Nested Class Summary
static class Light.Type
          Enumeration of the different types of light sources.

Constructor Detail

Light

public Light()
Instantiates a new light with standard parameters.
It is a directional light with the direction (0,0,1), a diffuse light component with (0.7,0.7,0.7), an ambient light component with (0.3,0.3,0.3) and a specular light component with (1,1,1)
